pullrequest.title: Make install path absolute, for easier installation into ~/.gazebo.

content.raw:
The package is a bit funky. The installation procedure installs zipped versions of each model alongside the raw models. This is done because `make install` was only intended to run on gazebosim.org. 

`make install` will work locally, but you'll also install all the model tarballs.

This is still a fine pull-request. Just wanted to provide more information.
content.html:
The package is a bit funky. The installation procedure installs zipped versions of each model alongside the raw models. This is done because make install was only intended to run on gazebosim.org.

make install will work locally, but you'll also install all the model tarballs.

This is still a fine pull-request. Just wanted to provide more information.
